name: Map ZOPA / bargaining range
summary: Estimate both sides’ reservation ranges and identify whether a deal zone exists; if not, decide whether you can expand the pie or should walk away.
counterparty_guidance: Avoid revealing your true reservation early; probe for their constraints and alternatives.
Challenge unrealistic assumptions about the deal zone with objective criteria or new issues.
If there is no overlap, seek value creation (trade issues) or end talks.

ui.card_summary: Check if an agreement is even possible—and how to expand the zone if not.
